Posts.Content: well my aunt used to suffer from breast cancer and the doctor had recommended Arimidex for her. It worked well for her. Have a talk with your physician prior to deciding to use Arimidex. If you are suffering from any medical ailment or are taking other medications, you may be specially monitored during the treatment process or have dosage adjustments.
